website_summaries.verdict: An exceptional training leash that is designed by dog lovers, for dog lovers.
pros: Leash handle includes a buckle that opens to allow the leash to be secured around trees, posts, and tables
Features a neoprene-padded handle that provides a comfortable no-slip grip
Leash is water-, UV- and mildew-resistant for long-lasting quality
cons: Leash sometimes can be tough to handle, particularly when the leash is used with bigger dogs

customer_reviews.title: Handy & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. Bought both sizes. They're sturdier than a different long lead I'd purchased--that one was flimsy and tangled easily. The ability to use these Mighty Paw leads as tethers is another advantage. I can clip this around a porch ballister, table leg, etc. The 15' and 30' leads might not be strong or long enough for large dogs but work well for my small breed dog. I think the price is fair.
customer_reviews.author: idigapony

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Recommended
customer_reviews.text: The nylon strap is strong - necessary for my lab puppy. The clip works well and is easy to attach. The handle is nice, and allows him to be secured to posts, etc. Not for everyday use in close quarters - but good for training. After using for a couple of weeks the longer leash works well for walks at the beach. If I let my lab puppy have all the leash he wants, he doesn't pull at all. He's satisfied with his range. It makes our walks much more fun for both of us. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ranchodoug

customer_reviews.title: 👌🏼
customer_reviews.text: Love this leash for our outings to the beach and the park. If you need to clip it onto something, be sure to wrap it around once before clipping or else tension will cause it to unhook. Also, be sure to since in fresh water after a beach trip so the clasp doesn't seize.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey K

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: This leash is impressive. I love the clip on the handle which makes it easy to attach the leash to a pole or other immovable object. Both the leash and the handle clip withstood an 85 lb German Shepherd at almost full speed when used to secure my dog. Many other products I have used have snapped at the handle or the leash itself itself snapped. The handle on the leash was comfortable when used as a long lead for training purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Carey

customer_reviews.title: Strong; love the buckled handle
customer_reviews.text: This is a great long leash for a medium or large size dog. It is heavy duty and has a buckle on the handle. I take this leash with me when we go to the park. I attach the handle to the metal BBQ base (or fence post or some else that is solid and sturdy) and let her romp, play and sniff around. I purchased the 15-foot but wish I'd bought the 30-foot leash instead. I would love to see this leash made in a 50-foot length, too.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalMelissa

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Long-line
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy long-line. We used it for a 9 week old large-breed puppy so he could explore and play with children in a non-fenced field. The best part about this one, which makes it worth paying a little more, is the loop, which has secure velcro and can be used to anchor it to a post or heavy furniture. When the puppy gets older, this will be great for search and rescue training.
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: A sturdy, larger lead with a padded handle.
customer_reviews.text: This leash does not curl up like cotton ones do, and fur does not stick to it. We use it as a tie out on our wrap around porch for our dog, and the leash is easily attached to a rail post. The padding helps to protect the wooden post. The lead enables our dog to access all parts of the porch and a good piece of yard space without quite reaching the sidewalks.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Graul

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, High Quality, Excellent Hardware - Leather Leash
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality leather leash that has a strong hook and a very nice feel. It fit my needs exactly. I really like the loop end opposite the hook which fits nicely around my hand for extra security. My dog is an exuberant 40 lb Boxer who is just learning to walk slowly. This leash keeps him secure and doesn't collect sticker burrs from the grass.
customer_reviews.author: A. Litman

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable in your hand.
customer_reviews.text: Great leash, but need to watch your dog if they are a chewer. Mine chewed thru it in less than 15 minutes of being distracted and not giving full attention to my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Heather136

customer_reviews.title: Our Perfect Leashes
customer_reviews.text: We use these leashes to take our huskies out. They are sturdy. We can clip the handles together to make one very long leash to manage our guys. The webbing is wide. We bought the two of the 30 and two of the 15 foot leashes. I plan to get them in shorter lengths.
customer_reviews.author: Indywillard

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy at all
customer_reviews.text: My dogs ate through these in minutes. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: AltEllie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but has an issue
customer_reviews.text: I bought this leash for training my dog in scent work. I like the fact that the leash didn't tangle or get in the way and it is of good quality. My issue is that I couldn't get a good grip on the leash to shorten and lengthen it. It kept sliding through my hands like silk. It is so slippery. I can't use it for my intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Cody J Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and versatile
customer_reviews.text: Great, clips to a tree limb as a tie out or hold the loop and use as a long training leash. Sturdy and the clip is strong. Serves its purpose and does it well.
customer_reviews.author: Brian&Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great leash!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic leash, soft, comfortable handle, well made. Unfortunately it was too big for my small dog so I gave it to a friend. Waiting for them to make products for the smaller dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Bought for traning class
customer_reviews.text: Im on my 2nd rounds on six week puppy traning. We use this to help with distant giving your pup a conman. Its strong clip great amount bounes cones with a littel set up in the bag to hold leash
customer_reviews.author: SexxyHorror

customer_reviews.title: and it has a clip on the hand hold so you can hook it on a post easily. My dog loves chewing on it
customer_reviews.text: It's thick, durable, and it has a clip on the hand hold so you can hook it on a post easily. My dog loves chewing on it, but it doesn't matter, it can handle it. The only problem is that it's hard to handle with a puppy on the end of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Very handy.
customer_reviews.text: Great length, handy clip at the end lets you either make a handle or attach the leash to a post, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanmarie Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great for kitty’s outdoor time!
customer_reviews.text: This leash is perfect for giving my kitten some outdoor time without me having to follow him around or confine him to a pen! I just tie it to the leg of my lawn chair and it’s good to go.
customer_reviews.author: V. Katzovitz

customer_reviews.title: Width uncomfortable for my smaller hands
customer_reviews.text: Love the length, sturdiness and features but it is too wide for my hand and cuts into it. Love the slide to the material but would be nice to have a few “stops or grips” incorporated to help “retract” leash.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B

customer_reviews.title: Great product for off leash training/recall
customer_reviews.text: I bought this leash for training my dogs to walk off leash & for their recall! I loved it that much I bought one for each of my dogs! They can happily drag this behind them & I can just pick it up when I need to! It's made from a good quality material that washes easily & the handle is comfortable for me to hold without ripping my hands. It also gives them plenty of freedom while reassuring me that they are still within a comfortable range. Love this product so much
customer_reviews.author: Aoife

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Was great at first. Good length and allowed for increased freedom for our mini golden doodle. Bought at the end of March, 2019. “Return window” was one month later the end of April, 2019. Puppy had completely tore through the material in multiple places by May, 2019. So it almost made it 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our new service dog, works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: It’s a long leash.
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes it because you can roam further than on the shorter beach.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Foster

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until the buckle broke
customer_reviews.text: This leash worked great and was exactly what we needed for our active pup. However one day she pulled hard and the buckle on the handle broke. We had only had it for about a month. So now its useless.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Great long line
customer_reviews.text: Awesome long line for our small dachshund. The handle is very comfy and the buckle makes it convenient to clip onto something solid when you need free hands
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Good training tool
customer_reviews.text: It’s really nice to let my dogs out and give them the freedom they need without worrying about them running off to chase deer. We’re working on our recall and these leashes are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The durability
customer_reviews.text: Nice leash for walking your fur friend in prairies or trails.... very comfortable to hold
customer_reviews.author: karen Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: great for loose leash training
customer_reviews.text: great for loose leash training. wish it had a hand strap as well but this does the job. ive bought plenty products from mighty paw and have not had an issue with any
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great for trying my 10 pound maltese/papaillon out to do his business.
customer_reviews.author: Wil

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with quality
customer_reviews.text: Using to play fetch off leash with a 6 month old who is still learning. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Marotta

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a great long line and the leash holder was ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a great long line and the leash holder was a nice touch. Will come back and add more once we really test it out :-)
customer_reviews.author: J. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great leash.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice long leash and I love that the loop on the end has a clip to undo it so you can loop it around things. My dog is only 20 pounds so it's plenty strong enough for him.
customer_reviews.author: Laura R Dragich

customer_reviews.title: Description of leash was perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Great for going to open spaces and your dog can explore more than 6 feet.
customer_reviews.author: sweetbeasts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this company! I just received my 15 ft leash. It is perfect and I love supporting small businesses like this one!
customer_reviews.author: hapamama

customer_reviews.title: Wish stronger
customer_reviews.text: My puppy chewed and tore. I wish I were stronger but I ordered again.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture, but not sure about the durability yet.. However, will test it soon.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Reed

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic long leash! This will be a second one for us a our favorite beach now has a leash law and we will be able to live this at Nana’s house for when we visit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Leash
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality leash. The padded handle is comfortable and the addition of the buckle to open the handle up is very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Lukas Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! The material is thick, the buckle is very secure, and it seems very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for training
customer_reviews.text: Great leash. Has lasted pretty well even with my dog chewing on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A.

customer_reviews.title: Happy puppy
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed, gives my Labradoodle the feeling of being off leash. Great for training outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good leash but it is not very durable
customer_reviews.text: Good leash but it is not very durable. I left my dog on it for 5 minutes unsupervised, and he chewed halfway through the leash.
customer_reviews.author: MOFT

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My darn dog is used to the length of my previous retractable leash so this won't work for me - but good leash
customer_reviews.author: stephen scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: So far this product does not disappoint. I ordered the 1"x 30'. We have used heavily 3 times, once for recall training in the grassy back yard, once on concrete drive and it did NOT fray while dog was dragging it across. Love the padded hand hold with buckle clip, used one day through two of my waist belt loops while putting down mulch and dog just wandered. I have a 50lb high energy dog and it has been wonderful. Price was nice too! Would purchase again no questions!
customer_reviews.author: Hofer

product_meta.title: Mighty Paw Long Dog Leash, Leash for Off-Leash Training, Includes a Buckled Padded Handle and Premium Quality Nylon Webbing
feature_bullets: WHY A LONG LEASH? Endorsed by thousands of trainers, long leashes provide a true "off-leash" feel that is essential for training, recalling, and behavior adjustment. Long leashes are also commonly known as a "long-line" or "check cord."
PERFECT FOR TRAINING – The handle includes a buckle that opens to allow the leash to be secured around trees, posts or tables to give your dog a natural off-leash feel.
MADE FOR COMFORT – Neoprene-padded handle provides a comfortable, no-slip grip. Swivel-free clasp prevents tangling when walking or training your busy dog!
WEATHERPROOF AND DURABLE– Made with premium quality nylon, the strap is water-, UV- and mildew-resistant for long-term, active use.

BORN IN THE USA – Mighty Paw is family-owned and operated out of Rochester, NY. We stand behind our products! Not satisfied with your product? Return it to us within 90 days and get 100% of your money back!
